it.emarolab.sit.sceneRepresentation

Class SpatialAtom

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.emarolab.sit.sceneRepresentation.SpatialAtom
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SITBase

    public class SpatialAtom
extends java.lang.Object
implements SITBase
    The container for objects and their shape.

    This class is a simple container for objects (individuals) and their shape (ontological class). The latter is considered to be the leaf in the CLASS#PRIMITIVE hierarchy in the ontology where it is assumed that the individual is classified in only one leaf.

    File: it.emarolab.sit.sceneRepresentation.SpatialAtom
    Licence: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, 29 June 2007
    Author: Buoncompagni Luca (luca.buoncompagni@edu.unige.it)
    affiliation: EMAROLab, DIBRIS, University of Genoa.
    date: 05/06/17

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpatialAtom

        protected SpatialAtom(SpatialIndividualDescriptor objectDescriptor)
        Fully initialise this object by setting the object name and its shape. The individual is Semantic.Descriptor.getInstance(), while the second is obtained by searching in all the classification (@link Individual.Type.buildTypeIndividual()) for the class the does not have any sub classes apart from OWLNothing.
        Parameters:
        objectDescriptor - the OWLOOP description of the individual that represents an object with a given shape.

    • Method Detail

      • getType

        public org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLClass getType()
        Return the singleton class classifying this object obtained on constructor that represents its shape.
        Returns:
        the shape type of this object (described as an ontological class).
